Phase 1 research-first: RES-010 (Link Understanding), RES-011 (Intent Classifier), RES-012 (Plugin SDK). 3건 병렬. Dev divisions 대기 (research 완료 후 착수).

RES-010: Link Understanding (URL 추출+요약, Readability/Defuddle, openclaw src/link-understanding/ 참조). RES-011: Intent Classifier (Gemini Flash, plan §L7, 라우팅 패턴). RES-012: Plugin SDK (openclaw src/plugins/, Zod manifest, ToolRegistry 확장). 3건 모두 docs/research/에 결과 저장.
